text.content:
God Fragments

By awakening your god fragment, you invite the deityâ€™s essence to permeate your body and personality in a manner that causes the boundaries between you and your god to blur. An awakened god fragment provides the following benefits.

Constant Benefits: You receive these benefits as long as you possess the Awaken God Fragment feat.

Divine Manifestation: Once per encounter, when you use a divine encounter or daily attack power, you can choose to augment it with your divine manifestation.

Quirks: This entry describes personality quirks that might manifest in you when you awaken the god fragment.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 57.
